AppSubtitle: A Better Genshin Impact, free and open source
Home_BgiStartDesc: Screen capture must be running to use features.
Home_TriggerIntervalDesc: Default 50ms. Not recommended to change for normal users. See docs for details.
Home_ManualPick: Manual Window Selection (if Genshin window not found)
Home_ManualPickDesc: Use when clicking Start still reports window not found
Home_AutoFixBitBlt: Auto-disable Win11 Windowed Optimization for BitBlt
Home_LinkedStartDesc: Auto-launch Genshin if not running when starting capture.
Home_GenshinPath: Genshin Install Path (Cloud Genshin not supported)
Home_StartArgsDesc: Leave empty if you don't know what launch arguments are.
Home_AutoEnterGameDesc: Auto-enter game after Genshin launches (auto door, claim Welkin Moon)
Home_UseCmdStartDesc: Enable this if Genshin shows 'illegal tool detected, restart PC'
Home_RecordTimeDesc: Starward will sync record time after launch
Settings_EnableDragResizeDesc: Drag to adjust position and size of log and status bar
Settings_ShowRealtimeStatusDesc: Show active tasks in overlay window
Settings_ShowFpsDesc: Restart required. May cause game crashes.
Settings_UidCoverDesc: Cover UID area in bottom-right corner
Settings_ShowDirectionDesc: Show NESW text around the minimap
Settings_TextOpacityDesc: Adjust text opacity in overlay window (0.0-1.0)
Settings_OverlayChildDesc: Overlay follows game window movement. Has bugs. Restart required.
Settings_ScreenshotHotkeyDesc: Screenshots for debugging, training data collection, etc.
Settings_ScreenshotUidCoverDesc: Generated screenshots will cover the UID area
Settings_MinToTrayOnCloseDesc: Close button will minimize to tray. Right-click tray icon to exit.
Settings_KeyBindingsDesc: Configure custom key bindings if you remapped keys in-game
Settings_GlobalKeyMappingDesc: Apply key binding settings to external scripts
Settings_FeatureMatch: Preferred Feature Matching for Map Pathing
Settings_FeatureMatchDesc: Affects all map pathing features. Restart required.
Settings_TeleportSettingsDesc: Settings for teleport in map pathing, auto domain, one dragon, etc.
Settings_MapZoomDesc: Recommended ON. Disabling may cause errors in some scripts.
Settings_MaxMouseMoveDesc: [100-2000] Too large may move mouse outside window
Settings_MapZoomOutDesc: [>600] Zoom out map to speed up teleport beyond this distance
Settings_MapZoomInDesc: [200-600] Zoom in map for precision below this distance
Settings_MouseIntervalDesc: [2-100] Lower = faster mouse. Increase if map movement stutters.
Settings_StatueNearbyDesc: Auto-select nearest statue, ignore specific location below
Settings_StatueMoveDesc: Auto-walk toward the statue after teleporting
Settings_HealWaitDesc: [1.0-30.0] Wait time for healing after teleporting to statue
Settings_ImportLocalRepoDesc: Use when online repo update is unavailable
Settings_OtherSettingsDesc: Configure other features like auto-focus restore, etc.
Settings_RestoreFocus: Force Restore Game Window on Focus Lost
Settings_RestoreFocusDesc: For scheduler and standalone tasks. Auto-activates game window when focus is lost. Pause task first if you want to switch away.
Settings_AutoDispatch: Auto Claim Dispatch During Map Teleport
Settings_AutoDispatchDesc: During path tracking, auto-detect and claim dispatch rewards when opening the map. Select city to activate.
Settings_ServerTimezoneDesc: Set game server timezone for daily reset calculations. JS scripts can use this for different region servers.
Settings_SchedulerRestartDesc: Auto-restart BGI after consecutive unexpected errors to recover functionality.
Settings_FailCountDesc: Restart BGI when task failures reach this count.
Settings_FarmingPlanDesc: When daily farming count exceeds limit (from 4AM), skip remaining farming tasks.
Settings_EliteLimitDesc: Skip elite-targeted farming scripts when limit is reached.
Settings_MobLimitDesc: Skip mob-targeted farming scripts when limit is reached.
Settings_MiyousheCalcDesc: Use HoYoLAB data (2-3h delay) to adjust farming counts. Cookie expires periodically and needs refresh.
Settings_MiyousheEliteLimitDesc: Skip elite-targeted farming scripts when limit is reached.
Settings_MiyousheMobLimitDesc: Skip mob-targeted farming scripts when limit is reached.
Settings_CookieSyncDesc: When enabled, cookie changes sync between scheduler log and here.
Settings_PaddleModelDesc: Select a different model if needed.
Settings_VersionUpdateDesc: Check if a new version is available
Settings_AboutBGIDesc: View project, docs, and other info
Settings_RestartGameDesc: Requires 'Launch Genshin Together' and 'Auto Enter Game' to be enabled.
Settings_001_3e074e: [>600] Zoom out map to speed up teleport beyond this distance
Trigger_003_1167cb: When option is not NPC dialogue and not blacklisted, auto-press F to pick up/interact
Trigger_005_01c41e: Paddle: recognizes all text, slower, less resource. Yap: partial text, faster & accurate, more resource.
Trigger_007_07916c: Exclude NPC dialogues, interaction options, items you don't need, etc.
Trigger_009_3326b5: Content that requires actively pressing F to interact. Use with blacklist.
Trigger_011_b647e2: Default is F. Built-in E and G keys. Read docs to change to other keys.
Trigger_013_dfaa80: Quickly skip story text, auto-select options, auto-submit items, etc.
Trigger_014_9cc707: Enable Background Mode (will only use interact key for story)
Trigger_015_4ecf29: Do not minimize the game. Mouse will auto-snap back when not in dialogue.
Trigger_017_b835da: Show mini window when game loses focus. Scroll to zoom, left-click to return, right-click to close.
Trigger_019_0e9de3: Disable this if you want to hear the full main story voice acting.
Trigger_021_a5d6d9: Higher priority than the option selection priority below
Trigger_023_fbf893: Separate multiple options with semicolons or newlines
Trigger_025_ccba3c: How dialogue options are selected after entering dialogue
Trigger_027_d02b7a: Allows you to read options clearly during auto-story
Trigger_028_9ab700: Delay Before Clicking Dialogue Confirm Button (ms)
Trigger_029_eee622: Allows you to read the full dialogue text during auto-story
Trigger_031_b754b8: Auto-submit items when the submission UI appears during dialogue. Supports multiple items.
Trigger_033_80a40b: Close pop-up pages during dialogue. May accidentally close map or camera.
Trigger_034_b67153: Katheryne - Auto Claim Daily Commission Rewards
Trigger_035_4bfd9b: When talking to Katheryne, auto-claim Daily Commission rewards
Trigger_037_afdc5e: Auto-claim completed expedition rewards and re-dispatch
Trigger_039_3c37e6: Only works when Auto Story is enabled. Auto-selects hangout options.
Trigger_041_c5ec31: Auto-click skip button in top-left corner during hangout events
Trigger_043_2fc045: Options will be selected based on branch keywords
Trigger_045_3453ba: Allows you to read options clearly during auto-hangout
Trigger_047_51f9db: Semi-auto fishing requires manual casting (full auto fishing moved to Standalone Tasks)
Trigger_048_cebbbc: Full auto fishing has been moved to Standalone Tasks
Trigger_051_d02fed: How often to check if HP is low or revival is needed
Trigger_055_b58e9b: When clicking a teleport point on the map (or in list), auto-click teleport
Trigger_056_82d56f: Delay for Clicking Candidate List Teleport Point (ms)
Trigger_057_fda4c2: Normal users should not modify this. Depends on OCR speed. Too low may cause click failures.
Trigger_058_3b2033: Wait Time for Right-side Teleport Panel (ms)
Trigger_059_fe4c54: Normal users should not modify this. Not recommended below 80ms. Too low may miss teleport button.
Task_004_f8ed7c: Select the deck and strategy you want to use
Task_006_d9ea13: Add delay if operations are too fast and animations haven't finished
Task_008_50483d: Use Thousand Stars Domain to refresh tree cooldown
Task_009_e80613: Must have unlocked and entered Thousand Stars Domain before
Task_011_76b48b: Number of wood cutting loops. Enter 0 for infinite loop until manually stopped.
Task_012_675eed: Enable OCR Wood Count Limit (requires 1080P+ resolution)
Task_013_2eaf09: After cutting, OCR counts wood and auto-stops when limit is reached
Task_014_ef0701: Wood Count Limit (Genshin daily max: 2000 per wood type)
Task_015_2fcb65: Takes effect when wood count limit is enabled. Auto-stops at configured limit.
Task_017_de8baa: Adjust this value if you want to see the wood obtained notification after using gadget
Task_021_6ac9e0: Optimize character rotation based on skill CD
Task_022_a17f28: Enter character name or name+CD to skip characters when their elemental skill is on cooldown. Format: Baizhu;Zhongli,12; Name only uses built-in CD, name+number uses that as CD (seconds). Separate with semicolons.
Task_024_799bc3: Stop auto combat when combat end is detected
Task_026_185be0: Quick check combat end during a rotation: check every N seconds (default 5) or after specific characters, at each character's rotation end.
Task_028_6dce0b: Parameters for quick combat end check. Enter numbers and names separated by semicolons. E.g.: 5;Baizhu;Zhongli; Numbers set check interval (seconds, ≤0 disables time check), names trigger check after that character's rotation.
Task_031_5e2d43: (Recommend with ~1s 'Faster Combat End Check') Before opening team UI to check combat end, first detect enemies and decide whether to approach or rotate to find them. (Pre-Q Check: check combat end before using Q. Try Face Enemy: face enemy at start and during combat)
Task_035_cd1c23: Delay after character skills end before checking combat end. Different characters may need different delays. Default 1.5s. Format: 2.5;Baizhu,1.5;Zhongli,1.0;
Task_037_088482: Delay after pressing team switch to check screen color blocks. Default 0.45s. Increase if frequent false positives, e.g. to 0.75. Ensure delay doesn't actually open the team config UI.
Task_039_3b10b4: Real-time detect and release shield/healer elemental skill during combat (empty = disabled)
Task_042_b7a32b: Disable Combat Strategy for This Character
Task_043_8532a5: Auto Release E or Q Skill
Task_046_be39d4: Detect shield/healer skill: short press or long press. Off=Short / On=Long
Task_048_f89952: Pick up nearby drops after combat (works better with Kazuha)
Task_050_055992: In seconds. 0 means no auto pick-up.
Task_052_f893d6: (Jean double pick-up: first pick empty, then pick again)
Task_053_3c3ad1: After combat, if Kazuha/Jean is available, perform hold-E to gather materials
Task_058_76f379: Return to combat node first, then go to Statue of the Seven if failed
Task_061_d369a6: Note: team name is the name you set in-game
Task_063_7f0846: Auto-teleport to the domain to farm
Task_065_65cb9c: Prioritize Condensed Resin, then Original Resin. Other resin types not used.
Task_067_ddcdde: When enabled, uses resin according to configured run counts
Task_073_f10580: Maximum artifact star rating for quick decomposition
Task_075_0f29f9: Delay after combat ends before looking for Petrified Tree, waiting for character skills to finish
Task_076_40b8d4: Use Small Steps When Finding Tree (normal users should not enable)
Task_077_4c895f: Enable this if your PC is slow and finding the tree takes too long
Task_078_b422f1: Walk to Start Domain and Claim Rewards
Task_079_4ff3a6: Enable this if your PC is slow and the F interaction prompt doesn't appear when starting domain or claiming rewards
Task_080_64b2ee: Number of Left-Right Confirmation Moves When Finding Tree (do not modify)
Task_081_7687b2: Number of left-right position confirmation moves during small-step walking
Task_082_79e772: Please equip 'Portable Nutrition Bag' first. Auto-press Z to eat when HP is low.
Task_084_1a71e7: Number of retries when a character dies during domain combat
Task_089_101fb9: Enter preset team name. Leave empty to keep current team.
Task_094_ec7e28: [Album] Auto-play songs that haven't achieved [Celestial Sound]
Task_095_651c81: When off, songs with rewards claimed are skipped. When on, songs with [Celestial Sound] achieved are skipped.
Task_097_165c5f: Set to [Legend]/[Master] for all rewards. Set to [All] to auto-play all difficulties.
Task_100_21e9fb: Auto-reel after this timeout and re-identify bait for casting
Task_102_2ea5c2: Force end task after this timeout
Task_104_916ec8: Fish all day, only daytime/nighttime fish, or don't adjust time
Task_106_dad73d: Save screenshots at critical decision points for analysis. Heavy I/O, disable when not debugging. Requires screenshot feature enabled.
Task_110_35f573: Auto-extract and prompt redeem code when switching to the app
Task_113_8964e6: Please switch to the artifact decomposition screen first
Task_114_6920a4: Will perform a quick decomposition selection first
Task_116_a4b924: Stops after reaching max check count
Task_118_0852f4: When recognition of a single artifact fails: skip or terminate
Task_121_5fcc57: Different screens have different parameters. Select the screen to scan.
Task_123_077b7f: Some items have the same name but different icons and star ratings
Task_124_292a28: Use Level as Name Suffix (Coming Soon)
Task_125_f91faa: Some items have the same name but different icons and levels
Task_127_aec89c: Stops after reaching max capture count
Task_128_060c12: Please switch to the target category screen first
Script_007_3c0095: (Experimental) Please select or create a config group in the sidebar
Script_008_fd1219: Right-click the sidebar to create a config group, or click the button below
Script_018_c36121: Export Modified Tasks from Control File
Macro_003_003e38: After triggering, recognizes current active character and executes corresponding macro
Macro_005_c83920: Hold to repeat: repeats while held; Toggle: press to start, press again to stop
Macro_008_730728: When character's macroPriority is 0, use this default macro number (1~5)
Macro_010_50d3e8: The macro config above supports individual macro numbers per character. Set the macroPriority field (1-5) in character macro config. Set to 0 to use the default combat macro number above.
Macro_012_cfd9de: Quickly move mouse horizontally. Configure hotkey to trigger.
Macro_014_42d539: Can be negative. Larger absolute value = faster. Don't set too large.
Macro_016_1f2e85: Try to set above 0. Switch tabs after configuring for changes to take effect.
Macro_018_2838ea: Quickly skip enhancement result display. Configure hotkey to trigger.
Macro_020_6d4e1e: Increase this value if high latency prevents skipping enhancement results
Macro_022_6c003d: Use on item purchase/exchange page. Starts from selected item, hold to keep buying.
Macro_024_4ce5c9: Auto-open inventory, place Serenitea Pot and enter
Macro_026_2f30ac: Bind hotkey to Genshin's confirm/cancel buttons
Macro_028_e73443: Easy unfreeze. Not recommended due to underwater hold-space scenarios.
Macro_030_97a795: Quick pick-up large amounts of drops. Somewhat redundant with auto pick-up.
OneDragon_004_ab5a8d: ± Right-click to add or remove tasks
OneDragon_010_2a5257: (Unset options can be configured in Standalone Tasks - Auto Domain)
OneDragon_012_0b7c7f: Go to specified domain, use resin, and auto-claim rewards.
OneDragon_013_8cdf22: Team Name to Switch When Entering Domain
OneDragon_014_c5d202: Note: this is the name you set in-game
OneDragon_021_bd94bb: When enabled, daily farming config is disabled.
OneDragon_022_2276e6: Cycle starts at 4:00 AM. E.g., Mon 4:00 to Tue 3:59 farms Monday domain.
OneDragon_031_4dea44: Sunday/Limited: 3 reward types, top to bottom (1/2/3) number:
OneDragon_034_38d9db: Use Condensed first, then Original. Other types unused.
OneDragon_035_6e2727: Use Resin Per Config Counts Below
OneDragon_038_72027b: Go to specified region's Adventurers' Guild to claim
OneDragon_040_5fb04d: Used to gain friendship EXP for specified team
OneDragon_045_42d7ad: Dates don't affect friendship and coin collection
OneDragon_055_3f1c9e: Action to execute after tasks complete
Hotkey_002_357719: Global Hotkey: supports combo keys and function keys, active immediately on launch. Key/Mouse Listener: supports any keyboard key, mouse side buttons, active only after feature starts (recommended). Click the type button to switch hotkey type. Features requiring hold cannot use Global Hotkey.
Notify_007_325d76: When enabled, allows JS scripts to send notifications
Notify_009_a1bfc4: Comma-separated. Leave empty for all notifications.
Notify_025_82b9ca: Windows notifications shouldn't overlap with game window to avoid accidental clicks
Notify_032_4dea54: If AppId and AppSecret are filled, images will be sent
Notify_040_addcac: Enter QQ number to receive messages
Notify_042_2d1dd6: Enter group number to receive messages
Notify_070_34a9c9: Enter Bark API endpoint, e.g.: api.day.app
Notify_072_f4dca1: Separate multiple devices with commas, semicolons, or spaces
Notify_086_635519: Choose whether to save push history
Notify_097_96faf4: Enter chat ID to receive messages
Notify_099_40ef5e: Leave empty for official API, or enter third-party API URL
Notify_127_b109c1: Display name for messages. Empty uses Discord preset name.
Notify_129_2d9ac7: Display avatar for messages. Empty uses Discord preset avatar.
Notify_131_32c788: PNG lossless, JPEG fast compression, WebP small size. Choose as needed.
KeyBind_001_bd4e9b: Key bindings here apply to all built-in features except Auto Pick-up, Fishing, Music Game, and Wood Cutting. Enable 'Global Key Mapping' in settings to apply to JS scripts, combat scripts, and simple pathing scripts. Please manually configure pick-up key, Star's Return key, and hide main UI key.
Settings_500_50e356: Screenshots can be saved via hotkey. Files are saved in
Settings_501_bd3d3b: When restarting BGI, also restart the game. Requires 'Launch Genshin Together' and 'Auto Enter Game' enabled on the Home page.
Settings_502_30d517: In farming scripts, actual successful combat count must be ≥ expected count to succeed, otherwise throws an exception. This can resolve infinite freezes caused by map opening failures, team switching, stuck on Z-switch interface, Welkin Moon popups, etc. However, ensure your team is strong enough – if consecutive scripts exceed the failure count due to deaths, it may trigger infinite restarts.
Settings_503_119428: Stricter than combat failure: if a tracking file is not fully executed, it counts as failure. Requires high tracking task stability. Check logs first – if there are consecutive red entries exceeding the failure count, enabling this is not recommended.
Trigger_504_512579: Full auto fishing has been moved to Standalone Tasks. Please use it there with hotkeys.
Trigger_505_593906: Detects low HP and auto-uses Portable Nutrition Bag to restore health.
Trigger_509_1b0be1: Display world map position and markers in overlay window
Trigger_510_7c0109: Auto-finish cooking at perfect timing during manual cooking (disable when not in use)
Task_513_f71899: Equip 'Royal Blessing of the Tree' gadget, loop restart game to refresh and collect wood -
Task_516_eb6ecc: Auto teleport and enter Stygian Onslaught -
Task_517_5e9f02: Can auto-play single songs or full-auto complete entire albums -
Task_518_3da30b: Use on the performance screen. Fall mode must be set to Plummet -
Task_519_d92fdb: Use on the album screen. Auto-play unfinished songs -
Task_520_d9d264: Do not bring a pet! Start this task at the fishing F button position -
Task_523_e86a32: to local, then enter the full path of torch_cpu.dll or torch_cuda.dll. Restart BGI if it doesn't take effect.
Task_525_b8559c: Filter and decompose artifacts one by one using match expressions, supports 5-star artifacts -
Task_526_0cf95c: All matching artifacts will be selected
Task_528_456547: Use the game's built-in filter to pre-filter
Task_529_6b1d5d: Usually enter the Flower of Life name from the set. Multiple names allowed; leave empty to skip.
Task_530_6fa3e5: Requires enabling screenshot in Settings. Files are saved in
Script_531_209085: Right-click the sidebar to create/modify config groups, drag to reorder. Groups can contain and configure JS scripts, key-mouse scripts, etc., with execution count and order control.
Script_533_c3a64f: Right-click below to add configs, drag to reorder. Supports BetterGI JS scripts, key-mouse recording scripts, etc. Use the scheduler to set execution count and order.
JsList_534_8ebc60: Use Javascript to invoke BetterGI capabilities in Genshin. Please use in the Scheduler!
JsList_535_c24bc3: Click to view Javascript scripting tutorial
Macro_536_a67768: Configure macros for each character, e.g.: Hu Tao A-charge-jump.
MapPath_538_cae83b: Enables auto-gathering, auto-mining, auto-farming, etc. Please use in the Scheduler!
MapPath_539_14f455: Click to view map pathing & recording tutorial
KeyMouse_540_4829ad: Recommended to record in-game using hotkeys. Use recordings in the Scheduler.
KeyMouse_541_0b2a30: Click to view key-mouse recording tutorial
